title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Education
body: Education       Manzanar's history offers compelling and relevant lessons for today.  In addition to primary documents, historic photographs, and more than 60 oral histories, there are standards-based lesson plans for primary and secondary education.     Plan a Field Trip Ranger-guided school group programs are available by reservation.  Curriculum Primary and secondary school curriculum materials meeting National and State curriculum standards.  Suggested Reading Many books are available on almost every aspect of the internment experience. The listing of resources does not presume endorsement by the National Park Service. Educator Resources Manzanar Educator Resources box is available through Manzanar History Association bookstore.
